text: Bella Thorne, her boyfriend Mod Sun and three friends were kicked out of Utah's Park City Marriott Sunday, where they were staying for the Sundance Film Festival, after hotel officials reportedly detected one of her associates smoking marijuana. The 20 - year - old and her pals'were seen rushing out of the hotel hours before the premiere'of her new movie, an insider told Page Six.'There were so many bags, they needed a trail car to carry them.'Bella, a native of South Florida, is at the wintry film festival in support of her new, Sam Levinson - directed thriller Assassination Nation, which also features Bill Skarsgard, Suki Waterhouse, Hari Nef, Abra, and Joel McHale.
